abstract: Rafik Zoheir Djebbour (born 8 March 1984) is an Algerian international footballer who currently plays for Nottingham Forest on loan from Olympiacos and also for the Algeria national team. He plays as a striker or a winger. He is known by the nickname "The Terrorist" as he has the ability to terrorise defences and due also to his machine gun goal celebrations.He made his senior international debut for Algeria in 2006 and played at the 2010 FIFA World Cup in South Africa but failed to score.
